quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Spin
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, lakes, college. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Rhoda, a show about a woman in her 30s who leaves her home in Minneapolis to start a new life in New York City, is a spin-off of what television show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Mary Tyler Moore Show

questions.question: A Different World, a show about the everyday lives of young women attending Hillman College, is a spin-off of what television show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Cosby Show

questions.question: What was the name of the university that Thornton and his son Jason attended in the great 80s movie Back to School?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Grand Lakes University

questions.question: Good Times, a show about a family struggling to make ends meet in Chicago,  is a spin-off of what television show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Maude

questions.question: What year did the hilarious movie from the 80s, Back to School first hit the theatres in the United States?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1986

questions.question: The late comedian Sam Kinison appears in the movie Back to School.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Frasier, a show about a neurotic psychiatrist who moves to Seattle to start fresh and lands a job hosting his own radio show, is a spin-off of what television show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cheers

questions.question: Who plays the college weirdo Derek Lutz in the movie Back to School?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Robert Downey Jr.

questions.question: Enos, a show about a bumpkin deputy who lands a job in Los Angeles after making an important arrest in his hometown, is a spin-off from what television show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Dukes Of Hazzard

questions.question: In the movie Back to School, Thorntons son is the towel boy for  the school diving team. One of the star divers on the team (Chas) gets hurt, so Thornton has to fill in for him. What is the name of the famous dive that Thornton performs in the competition?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Triple Lindy

questions.question: What is the name of Thorntons bodyguard/driver in the classic film Back to School?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lou

questions.question: What does Thornton do for a living in the hit 80s movie Back to School?

options.text: He owns the Milwaukee Brewers major league baseball team.
He owns a string of donut shops.
He owns a chain of Big and Fat stores.
He owns a bunch hot dog trucks.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He owns a chain of Big and Fat stores.

questions.question: What was Thorntons last name in the movie Back to School?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Melon

questions.question: What is the nickname of the Grand Lakes University swim team in the movie Back to School?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hooters

questions.question: What American entertainer was born Tula Ellice Finklea on March 8, 1921, in Amarillo, Texas?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cyd Charisse

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Actress
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, director. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: American entertainer Herbert Khaury, born April 12, 1932, was better known as this stage name, after the character from Dickens, A Christmas Carol.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tiny Tim

questions.question: How does Johnny Cade kill Bob Sheldon in the popular 80s movie The Outsiders?

options.text: cracks him in the head with a rock

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: switchblade

questions.question: Best known as lead singer of The Four Seasons, he was born Francis Stephen Castelluccio in Newark, New Jersey.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Frankie Valli

questions.question: What American film and stage actress, who appeared in Shock Treatment (1964), was born Betty Joan Perske on 16 September 1924 in New York City, New York?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lauren Bacall

questions.question: What year did the great 80s movie The Outsiders first hit the movie theatres in the United States?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1983

questions.question: What African American actor and rapper, originally a member of the group, N.W.A, was born OShea Jackson on June 15, 1969?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ice Cube

questions.question: Name the American actress and signer, born Dana Elaine Owens on March 18, 1970, whose brother Lance was killed in 1992.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Queen Latifah

questions.question: What American actor, producer and director, who starred as Little Joe on TV show, Bonanza, was born Eugene Maurice Orowitz?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Michael Landon

questions.question: What American actor, famous for his role in TV series The Six Million Dollar Man, was born Harvey Lee Yeary?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lee Majors

questions.question: In the hit 80s movie The Outsiders, when Ponyboy and Johnny tell Dallas that they want to turn themselves in to the police and admit to killing Bob Sheldon, Dallas gets mad at them. They are driving together in a car and see a building on fire. What type of building is on fire?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: church

questions.question: What an American singer, songwriter, and actress was born Kathie Epstein on August 16, 1953, in Paris, France?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kathy Lee Gifford

questions.question: What American television and film actress, married for some years to musician/composer Burt Bacharach, was born Angeline Brown on September 30, 1931?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Angie Dickinson

questions.question: In the great 80s movie The Outsiders, what state do the principal characters live in?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Oklahoma

questions.question: After Johnny kills Bob in the movie The Outsiders, he and Ponyboy go to Dallas Winston ( Matt Dillon ) for help and he gives them directions to go hide out somewhere. Where do they go to hide out ?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: an abandoned church in Windrixville

questions.question: What American entertainer, who once flew over the Grand Canyon, was born David Seth Kotkin?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: David Copperfield

quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Austin Powers and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, festival, dallas. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the 80s movie The Outsiders, Keith Two-Bit Matthews (Emilio Estevez) is wearing a shirt with a Disney character on it . What is the name of this Disney character?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mickey Mouse

questions.question: What year did the movie Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery come out in the movie theatres?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1997

questions.question: In the film The Outsiders, Dallas Winston opens up a homeless shelter and takes care of all the kids in need.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What was the name of the person who owned the dairy farm at which the Woodstock Festival took place?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Max Yasgur

questions.question: Which of these is one of Austin Powers catchphrases from the movie Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery?

options.text: The devil made me do it

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yeah, baby!

questions.question: In the movie Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery, Austin Powers was frozen in what year in the 1960s?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1967

questions.question: Who played the role of Austin Powers in the movie Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Michael Myers

questions.question: What was the name of Dr. Evils cat in the movie Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mr. Bigglesworth

questions.question: In the movie Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery, Dr. Evil has android models with guns that pop out of their breasts. What is the name of these android models?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fembots

questions.question: Who was the first singer to perform at the legendary 60s Woodstock Festival?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Richie Havens

questions.question: What actress plays the role of Cherry Valance in the movie The Outsiders?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Diane Lane

questions.question: What actress played the role of Vanessa Kensington in the hit movie  Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery ?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Elizabeth Hurley

questions.question: In the movie Austin Powers: International Man Of Mystery, which one of Dr. Evils henchmen was played by actor Robert Wagner?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Number 2

questions.question: In the movie Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery, Austin marries Vanessa Kensington.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What state did the Woodstock Festival take place in?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: New York

quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Movie and Silence
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, disneys, bills. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What is the name of the young FBI trainee played by Jodie Foster in the thriller The Silence of the Lambs?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Clarice Starling

questions.question: Actress Michelle Pfeiffer was originally asked to star in the movie The Silence Of The Lambs portraying FBI trainee Clarice Starling.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: From what Disney movie is the song you can hear in the audio file?

options.text: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs

questions.question: What is the name of Buffalo Bills dog in the movie The Silence of the Lambs?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Precious

questions.question: What did Clarice Starling want to give Dr. Hannibal Lecter when she visits the asylum in the movie The Silence of the Lambs?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: the case file

questions.question: Si and Am are the two characters that sang the song you hear. What Disney movie is it from?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lady and the Tramp

questions.question: The song you hear in the track is from Disneys 2002  Lilo and Stich movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What year did The Silence of the Lambs make its U.S. debut in movie theatres?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1991

questions.question: This song was sung by the character Horatio Felonious Ignacious Crustaceous Sebastian in what Disney movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Little Mermaid

questions.question: In a scene from thriller The Silence of The Lambs, Clarice Starling and Jack Crawford are performing an autopsy on one of the victims. What does Clarice find in the throat of the victim?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a chrysalis moth

questions.question: The popular Disney movie you will hear an extract from became a long-running show on Broadway.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Lion King

questions.question: In the movie The Silence of the Lambs, how does Clarice finally figure out that she is in Buffalo Bills house?

options.text: She sees a fur coat in the house.
He tells her I am Buffalo Bill.
She sees lots of yarn and thread in the house.
She sees a victims head in the house.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She sees lots of yarn and thread in the house.

questions.question: What 1967 animated Disney feature is this song from?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Jungle Book

questions.question: In the hit movie The Silence of the Lambs, what did Dr. Hannibal Lecter do before getting nine life sentences in a Baltimore mental institute?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: phychiatrist

questions.question: What is the name of the serial killer in the great movie The Silence of the Lambs?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Buffalo Bill

quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Misery and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, profession, director. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What was the name of the character played by the  Academy Award-winning actress Kathy Bates in the sensational movie Misery?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Annie Wilkes

questions.question: What is the name of the 1991 Disney movie this song is from?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Beauty and the Beast

questions.question: Who was the director of  the hit 90s movie Misery?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rob Reiner

questions.question: In the 90s movie Misery, how does Paul Sheldon end up waking up in somebodys home?

options.text: He went to the wrong house

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: car accident

questions.question: This song you can hear in the track is from the Walt Disney animated movie Mulan.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What is the profession of Paul Sheldon, played by James Caan, in the movie Misery?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Writer

questions.question: In the thriller Misery,  Annie finds out that Paul has been out of his room. She then gets even with him by doing what?

options.text: breaking his ankles with a hockey stick
breaking his arms with a pick axe
breaking his ankles with a sledgehammer
breaking his ankles with a baseball bat

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: breaking his ankles with a sledgehammer

questions.question: In the movie Misery, Paul sends Annie to the store. What does she buy for him?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: typing paper

questions.question: What year did the movie My Cousin Vinny first hit the theatres?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1992

questions.question: Listen to the track and decide what animated Disney feature this song is from.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pocahontas

questions.question: How does Annie Wilkes get knocked out in the movie Misery?

options.text: Paul cracks her in the head with one of his books.
Paul breaks the champagne bottle over her head.
Paul clubs her in the head with a tire iron.
Paul trips her and she hits her head on a typewriter.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Paul trips her and she hits her head on a typewriter.

questions.question: What year did the movie Misery first hit the movie theatres in the United States?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1990

questions.question: This song won the Academy Award for best song in a movie. What Disney movie did it appear in?

options.text: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pinocchio

questions.question: In the film Misery, Paul leaves his room while Annie is out of the house. How does he find out about her incriminating background?

options.text: He finds 12 dead bodies in the basement.
He is watching television and sees a story about her on the news.
Somebody comes to the house and tells him about her past.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He finds an old scrapbook.

questions.question: At the end of the movie Misery, Paul is explaining to his book editor that sometimes he still sees Annie walking around. While he is saying this, he sees Annie walking towards him. Who is actually walking towards him?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A waitress in the restaurant
